author: jstrachan
msg: removed unnecessary dependency on log4j which is no longer needed (now werkz isn't using it directly)

author: werken
msg: * demo.werkz2 now actually works and runs the demo.
* Re-aligned the Werkz taglib to the actual werkz vocabulary and semantics.
* Fixed build.xml to pick up the Jelly default properties for the
internally registered jelly:foo taglibs.  Still munging test.classpath.

author: werken
msg: Added jakarta-ant as a <dependency> in order to decrease the
amount of exceptions thrown by demo.werkz2.

author: werken

which is a post-compile-callback.  This is exactly why maven-ng

author: jstrachan
msg: got the basic Werkz example working now. Need to add dependencies to <target> and then experiment with local build.jelly and a ${maven.home}/mediator.jelly
also when called from the <java> task, rather than the <jelly> task, the Ant tag library doesn't work properly yet.
